law.text: The Department of Revenue may promulgate rules and regulations necessary to develop, implement and administer the provisions of KRS 131.560 to 131.595.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 151, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 405, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1984.
